description: Read an image from a file and writes it to a byte array.
method_declaration: public static byte[] imageWriteExample(final File file) throws ImagingException, ImagingException, IOException

description: Extract and display EXIF metadata like GPS data from JPEG or TIFF image files
Writes EXIF metadata to an image file specified by the path, using given metadata parameters.
method_declaration: public void writeExifMetadata(String imagePath, Map<String, Object> metadata)

description: Converts an image from its original format to another format with specified compression settings.
method_declaration: public void convertAndOptimizeImage(File input, File output, ImageFormat outputFormat, int compressionLevel)

description: Processes a batch of images applying specified operations like resizing or filtering, then saves them in a uniform format.
method_declaration: public void batchProcessImages(List<File> files, ImageProcessingOptions options)

description: Reads multiple images, updates their EXIF metadata based on provided values, and saves the modified images.
method_declaration: public void updateImageMetadataInBatch(List<File> files, Map<String, Object> newMetadata)

description: Analyzes a list of images to determine size, color depth, and ICC profiles, and generates a comprehensive report.
method_declaration: public void analyzeImagesAndGenerateReport(List<File> files, File reportOutput)

description: Identifies the image format and applies format-specific processing tasks to handle incompatibilities.
method_declaration: public void recognizeAndProcessImageFormat(File input, File output)
